entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
